item.title: Welcome to My Cybersecurity Journey
item.description:
Welcome to My Cybersecurity Portfolio! üõ°Ô∏è Link to heading

Hello and welcome to my cybersecurity portfolio! I’m Adithya Kallaje, a BTech student passionate about information security and cybersecurity. This blog will document my learning journey, share insights, and showcase projects as I work towards becoming a cybersecurity professional.

Why Cybersecurity? Link to heading

In today’s digital age, cybersecurity has become more crucial than ever. With the increasing number of cyber threats, data breaches, and sophisticated attacks, the need for skilled cybersecurity professionals continues to grow. What draws me to this field is:
